Files Headings

level1.js
¶ 
1  /* globals module, require*/
2  
3  var Phaser = require('phaser');
4  
5  var ARCADE = Phaser.Physics.ARCADE;
6  
7  var Player = require('../entity/player');
8  var ScoreText = require('../entity/scoreText');
9  
10  
11  module.exports = {
12    create: function () {
13      var game = this.game;
14      game.physics.startSystem(ARCADE);
15  
16      this.background = this.add.tileSprite(0, 0, 480, 320, 'menu_background');
17      this.background.autoScroll(-100, 0);
18  
19      this.player = new Player(game);
20  
21      this.blocks = game.add.group();
22      this.blocks.enableBody = true;
23      this.blocks.physicsBodyType = ARCADE;
24  
25      this.blocks.createMultiple(10, 'game_sprites', 1);
26  
27      this.labelScore = new ScoreText(game);
28  
29      this.input.onDown.add(this.player.jump, this);
30  
31      this.blockTimer = game.time.events.loop(500, this.addBlock, this);
32      this.scoreTimer = game.time.events.loop(Phaser.Timer.SECOND, this.labelScore.addScore, this.labelScore);
33  
34  
35    },
36  
37    update: function () {
38      var game = this.game;
39      if (this.player.inWorld === false) {
40        this.restartGame();
41      }
42      game.physics.arcade.overlap(this.player, this.blocks, this.restartGame, null, this);
43  
44    },
45  
46    addBlock: function () {
47      var x = 480,
48        y = ((Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1) * 60) - 30;
49  
50      var block = this.blocks.getFirstDead();
51      block.reset(x, y);
52      block.body.velocity.x = -200;
53      block.checkWorldBounds = true;
54      block.outOfBoundsKill = true;
55    },
56  
57    restartGame: function () {
58      var game = this.game;
59  
60      this.labelScore.resetScore();
61  
62      game.time.events.remove(this.blockTimer);
63      game.time.events.remove(this.scoreTimer);
64      game.state.start('mainMenu');
65    }
66  
67  };
68
